public ref class Adorner abstract : System::Windows::FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示修饰 的 的抽象类。

span.span: Abstract class that represents a that decorates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 装饰器是 绑定到的自定义 。An adorner is a custom that is bound to a . 装饰器呈现在装饰器层中，装饰器层是始终位于装饰元素或装饰元素集合之上的呈现图面;装饰器的呈现独立于呈现 装饰器所绑定到的。Adorners are rendered in an adorner layer, which is a rendering surface that is always on top of the adorned element or a collection of adorned elements; rendering of an adorner is independent from rendering of the that the adorner is bound to. 装饰器通常使用位于装饰元素左上部的标准 2D 坐标原点，相对于其绑定到的元素进行定位。An adorner is typically positioned relative to the element to which it is bound, using the standard 2-D coordinate origin located at the upper-left of the adorned element. > [!NOTE] > 的父级 是 呈现的 ，而不是要装饰的元素。The parent of an is the that renders the , not the element being adorned. > [!NOTE] > 放置在装饰器层中的任何内容将呈现在设置的其他任何样式的顶部。Anything placed in the adorner layer is rendered on top of the rest of any styles you have set. 换言之，装饰器始终以可见的方式位于顶部，无法使用 z 顺序重写。In other words, adorners are always visually on top and cannot be overridden using z-order.

span.span: WPF Photo Viewer Demo

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform GetDesiredTransform(class System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform transform) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetDesiredTransform (transform As GeneralTransform) As GeneralTransform

abstract member GetDesiredTransform : System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform -> System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform override this.GetDesiredTransform : System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform -> System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform

param.name: transform
param.span: 当前应用于装饰元素的转换。

span.span: The transform that is currently applied to the adorned element.

summary.span: 基于当前应用于装饰元素的转换，返回装饰器的 。

span.span: Returns a for the adorner, based on the transform that is currently applied to the adorned element.

returns.span: 要应用于装饰器的转换。

span.span: A transform to apply to the adorner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 装饰器的转换可能需要不同于它修饰的元素。An adorner may need to be transformed differently than the element it decorates. 例如，应将像点这样的装饰器（如大小调整句柄）与装饰元素一起进行转换和旋转，但不能缩放。For instance, adorners which act like points, such as resize handles, should be translated and rotated along with the adorned element, but not scaled. 与此相反，在元素上显示选框的装饰器可能需要与装饰元素相同的转换。By contrast, an adorner that displays a marquee on an element might require the same transform as the adorned element. 此方法由关联的调用， 以提供筛选不需要或不需要的转换的机会。This method is called by the associated to provide an opportunity to filter unwanted or unneeded transforms. 此方法的实现应检查传入转换 (这是装饰元素的转换) 并删除不有用或不应用于装饰器本身的方面。Implementations of this method should examine the incoming transform (which is the transform for the adorned element) and remove aspects that are not useful or should not be applied to the adorner itself. 此时，此方法还可用于添加其他转换详细信息，例如，添加一个允许装饰器控制其相对于装饰元素的位置的翻译。This method can also be used to add additional transform details at this time, for instance adding a translation that enables the adorner to control its position relative to the adorned element.

The potential clipping geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现始终返回 `null`。This implementation always returns `null`. 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 若要确保装饰器始终呈现最顶层，则忽略剪裁约束，除非 为 `true` 。To ensure that adorners are always rendered topmost, clipping constraints are ignored unless is `true`. 这使装饰器能够在装饰元素的边框外呈现。This enables an adorner to render outside of the adorned element's bounding rectangle.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否启用装饰器剪辑的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether clipping of the adorner is enabled.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指示是否启用装饰器剪辑。

span.span: A value indicating whether clipping of the adorner is enabled.

value.span: 如果此属性为 ，则不剪裁装饰器。

span.span: If this property is , the adorner is not clipped.

value.span: 如果此属性为 ，则使用与装饰元素相同的剪辑几何图形来剪辑装饰器。

span.span: If this property is , the adorner is clipped using the same clipping geometry as the adorned element.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用剪裁装饰器会导致显著的性能成本。Enabling clipping an adorner incurs a substantial performance cost. 通常，应禁用装饰器的剪辑。In general, clipping of the adorner should be disabled.
